thread.title: FBI Director Comey Says He Isn't Going Anywhere
thread.title_full: FBI Director Comey Says He Isn't Going Anywhere

author: Katie Pavlich
title: FBI Director Comey Says He Isn't Going Anywhere
text:
FBI Director Comey Says He Isn't Going Anywhere Share 
Speaking from a cyber security conference in Boston Wednesday, FBI Director James Comey said he plans to finish out the entirety of his 10-year term. 
"You're stuck with me for another six and a half years," Comey said. 
Comey was appointed Director by President Barack Obama in 2013 and has faced harsh criticism from Republicans and Demcorats over a number of Bureau decisions. 
During a question and answer period with reporters, Comey addressed a number of issues surrounding the privacy of American citizens but did not get asked about presdient Trump's claim he was wiretapped by former President Obama. Tags:
